content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.

The performance of the chord progression includes an incorrect resolution of an inverted seventh chord. It is incorrect because the

choices.label: soprano voice of the seventh chord does not resolve in stepwise motion
bass voice of the seventh chord does not resolve in stepwise motion
soprano voice of the seventh chord is approached by a leap
bass voice of the seventh chord is approached by a leap

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

topic.text: 4.5: Voice Leading with Seventh Chords in Inversions

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
